website_summaries.verdict: Slim profile and a deep base make this toolbox compatible with a variety of trucks.
pros: Narrow design makes it easier for you to see out your rear window
Solid metal construction resists the normal abuse from the daily commute
Two high-quality latch points keep the lid on and locked during transport
Self-rising shocks allow for single- handed entry
cons: Narrow profile makes it difficult to hold larger tools and items

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk... It's a tiny box that was put together in the cheapest way possible. See photos. Plus it had a dent in it when it arrived. Same company builds the boxes for Lowe's they are equally junk.
customer_reviews.author: JC Companies, Inc

customer_reviews.title: Awful!!!!!  Better Built NOT
customer_reviews.text: Awful! Item was dented big time just from shipping! Weak, and paper thin, it will last no time. See pics.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Menezes

customer_reviews.title: I feel like price was very reasonable
customer_reviews.text: As stated in some of the other reviews the material is extremely thin. Its one of those get what you pay for things. I feel like price was very reasonable. Something i did not realize until after purchase (although it is stated in description) is that this box is very narrow it is not as wide as typical toolbox. I do kinda like the idea of it as it would allow for more cargo space in the bed of truck
customer_reviews.author: John Clark

customer_reviews.title: Read the reviews...this box is cheap for a reason
customer_reviews.text: The day after this box shipped, Home Depot has the same size but several steps up in sturdiness and quality on sale for the same price. Save your money and wait for a sale on a better box. The lid sits slightly out of level, and I had to drill my own holes in the box to connect to the clamp system because even though my truck make/model is listed, the pre-punched anchor holes set in the wrong place. It’s very light weight, and I’m sure anyone motivated could rip the lid off if they wanted.
customer_reviews.author: TommyKnuckles

customer_reviews.title: Love this tool box
customer_reviews.text: What I love most of all about this tool box is that it is a slim fit in the back of my truck, conventional tool boxes take up much more room and have a bad habit of getting a bunch of trash under them, with this tool box it is a much slimmer degsign that allows you to easily see and reach anything that might get up under it. was still able to fit floor jack, and all tools that i needed inside of it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Didnt fit 06 f250 diesel. But i made it work
customer_reviews.text: Bought used for 120, package was ravaged but box was okay. Came with the keys. No mounting hardware. The holes where mounting hardware goes, was about 2 inches to short on one side. I used wire to mount it but definitely was disappointed. It says 70 inches but is more 68 between holes. You get what you pay for. Ide still buy it
customer_reviews.author: Your mom

customer_reviews.title: Toolbox ok
customer_reviews.text: Well it probably would have but it had some damage I assume in shipping but we needed a toolbox that locked because are old one didn't and this one had a key to lock it but the toolbox didn't lock so had to send it back..
customer_reviews.author: C. Baker

customer_reviews.title: The latches are pretty bad and the sheet metal is VERY thin
customer_reviews.text: The latches are pretty bad and the sheet metal is VERY thin. Bought this for my trailer to hold life jackets and paddles, it's perfect for my needs but it would not be recommended for actual tool use.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for what I needed it for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for what I needed it for. Had a dent in top from shipping, and lock system doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor welding job. It appears to be put together so fast there are several burn marks. The corners look like a child did them.
customer_reviews.author: randy

customer_reviews.title: Built to hold bedroom slippers
customer_reviews.text: Some of the finest imported aluminum foil. A good sneeze will dent this “toolbox”. I didn’t pay much for it, compared to others available, now I know why.
customer_reviews.author: R Friedenberg

customer_reviews.title: Tin foil
customer_reviews.text: Sent back, it was very cheap and paper thin. I think a screw driver would stab through it
customer_reviews.author: jimmy mcgee

customer_reviews.title: smaller than the rest in wideth
customer_reviews.text: it's smaller than i thought,,wow,,but i like it ,,i'll give it a five ,,yep it is kind of tin,,but hey you get what you order
customer_reviews.author: steven oliver

customer_reviews.title: Good for small loads, not for heavy tools.
customer_reviews.text: The material is fairly flimsy, so it came with some dings already in it. If you’re using it for heavy tools, I would not buy. But it does work for light loads and doesn’t eat up a lot of bed space. While it was easy to install in a matter of minutes, using better built’s own mounting hardware, it would not sit flush against the front of the bed in my Silverado.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W Alston

customer_reviews.title: Small and Functional
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tool box for a friend who wanted a tool box that did not take up a lot of space in his bed. This box was perfect for a few light weight tools and other sundries that he carries all the time, mostly for highway driving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Might as well be made of plastic
customer_reviews.text: I should have believed the previous reviews this company does not know how to pack a product it arrived with a half a dozen dents and torn box, very thin metal might as well be plastic
customer_reviews.author: Leonard olivas

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size for keeping your on the go tools and cargo secured. If you are looking for lots of room, this is not the box for you. I wanted something to leave extra room for my sliding fifth wheel and it is perfect. Love the low profile!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Bad measurements
customer_reviews.text: It was way to small for my truck. I had to send it back and get a different one and the other one I got still didn’t fit they sent me the same size...
customer_reviews.author: Nicole romero

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very thin aluminum. Ordered 5 for a truck sale, 3 arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Veena B.

customer_reviews.title: Product not as described.
customer_reviews.text: Dimension shown in product description was "assembled" 72x15x18. What would assembled mean beside assembled-it shouldn't mean crated size! Dimension in specification showed 70x13x13. I ordered on basis of larger size. Actual length measurement is 69 inchesx13x13! Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila B.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice box
customer_reviews.text: Very nice box the only thing is wrong with this box is the mounting slats r not long enough
customer_reviews.author: Sylvie Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best price we found anywhere and is exactly what my husband wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Arrived On time.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with dent the size of my fist. Other then that was just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Turcotte

customer_reviews.title: Design is good providing no obstructions to view out of back window
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality tool box. Lid flexes during opening and closing, which can cause a little problem with latching. The box will dent or bend over time with use because of little to no reinforcement of the walls. Design is good providing no obstructions to view out of back window, and mounts high enough to provide storage space for materials underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas F Werderitsch

customer_reviews.title: Seem Flimsy But Work
customer_reviews.text: Not As Sturdy As Other Toolboxes But So Far So Good
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: fits dodge ram
customer_reviews.text: this is a great tool box for the price. only used for cleaning supplies and extras
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Low profile is nice.
customer_reviews.text: Put this one in our 2008 Ram 2500. Low profile is nice.
customer_reviews.author: David Wells

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. No problems attaching to truck with tool box tie downs.
customer_reviews.author: E.L.Suddith

customer_reviews.title: Was dented when received
customer_reviews.text: There were several dents in it when I pulled it out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Debora Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great truck box Fitted perfectly on my 06 chevy silverado Really light weight Has some scratches on the welding on the edges buts its okay.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have not had any issues and it takes up minimal space
customer_reviews.author: JULIAN A COCHRAN

customer_reviews.title: latches are crap
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this tool box the lid opened going down the Hiway. The latches would not close and catch. This is a poorly made cheap toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My product was dented all over. I was expecting a new tool box and it came looking used and as if it was used to play soccer with. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Junk came with dents in it ! Not one several ! Looked like it was dropped from a plane
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: I like the box
customer_reviews.text: I like the box,it's lite. The low profile is great. mine came with 4 different dents which I think was due to the shipper
customer_reviews.author: Rodger A Fowler

customer_reviews.title: It arrived damaged- multiple surfaces!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived dented in numerous places. Item was somewhat lightweight but not sturdy enough to arrive undamaged at my home.
customer_reviews.author: jojo

customer_reviews.title: Bought for husband Birthday
customer_reviews.text: Will get a better response once a new toolbox is here and damage free. UPS needs to be careful when dropping off
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Dents very easy
customer_reviews.text: Toolbox arrived bent in several places. Bought it as a gift. " Here's your bent up birthday present ". Not worth the money. A lot flimsier than box from I have from Lowes, by same manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Henry

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is very helpful with choosing what fits your vehicle.
customer_reviews.text: Just a toolbox for a few tools without taking up a lot of space. This is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lee C.

customer_reviews.text: Bought as refurbished, was a little rougher looking than expected
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: Defective lock
customer_reviews.text: It says locking tool box but it doesn't lock .. you can turn the lock but it still opens
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received the box for my husband for Father's Day. ...
customer_reviews.text: Received the box for my husband for Father's Day. It was dented. He said it felt very thin. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Sky Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: Item came with dent on middle backside and the key doesn't lock it.
customer_reviews.author: Tabetha

customer_reviews.title: Came with a big ding on the top of tool box which would be drivers side.. will return
customer_reviews.text: Came with a big ding on top of tool box drivers side
customer_reviews.author: stacey wright

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly in conjunction with my fuel slip tank. Hinges and latches have quality components.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Showed up damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty bummed that this showed up with a big dent on the hinge side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Box  Good Value
customer_reviews.text: good value for the money. It is not the Cadillac of the tool boxes, but its not $1000 either. It does the job for what we need. No, its not heavy duty but its well made.
customer_reviews.author: Vespasion

customer_reviews.title: The toolbox was very thin and all bent up when ...
customer_reviews.text: The toolbox was very thin and all bent up when we received it! I had to work on it before it would shut properly. I do not know if this was do to the supplier or the shipping method but it was very disappointing!! It does serve the purpose though after I fixed it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: This is an Awesome tool box for light use
customer_reviews.text: This is an Awesome tool box for light use, I use it for holding fold up chairs, some tools and jumper cables, no issues
customer_reviews.author: Danny Patt

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shiny will hold what you need it too.
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is great not real wide, metal is thin and will dent easy but just push it out. Has keys and a lock I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Mcgee

customer_reviews.title: Great truck toolbox.  Buy it, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and sturdy truck tool box. It is not as deep as I wanted, but has given me the best of both worlds. I can store all me top-down straps and tools in this box. It still allows me to haul 8 foot lumber in my truck bed.
customer_reviews.author: johkit

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Toolbox
customer_reviews.text: Showed up damaged. Big dent on the top of the toolbox. The packaging was also damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Geist

customer_reviews.title: Loved the tool box
customer_reviews.text: Loved the tool box, low profile and big enough for tools but not big and bulky like some. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it is the right size I want it and comes on time.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

product_meta.title: Better Built 73010284 Truck Tool Box
product_meta.description:
AMAZON.COM
70In Crossover Classic Single Lid Narrow, Lo-Profile Truck Tool Box
feature_bullets: 70IN CROSSOVER CLASSIC SINGLE LID NARROW, LO-PROFILE TRUCK TOOL BOX
Assembled product dimensions (L x W x H) 72.00 x 15.00 x 18.00 Inches.The narrow design allows for more room in the bed of your truck, taking up only 12 inches of front to back space

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars120 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
